1.0.4.name: wordpress/app-la-carte
1.0.4.description:
Create a completely native mobile phone app with App La Carte by simply installing a plugin, absolutely no coding necessary! Once installed visit App La Carte set up your app, enter your website URL and you're done.

Setting up

Install the App La Carte plugin, set up your app by visiting App La Carte. Select Wordpress as a feature, choose your theme colors and fonts, add in your website URL in the Wordpress tab and you're done. To view your app on a mobile phone download the App La Carte app available on iTunes or the Google Play store and enter your login details.

Features

This plugin creates a full featured native app for your iPhone and Android! With a fantastic interface and a whole lot of features built right in including Search, viewing and posting comments, viewing image galleries. You can be confident your websit
